candidates.name: Tania Gibson
candidates.why_elect: My energy and enthusiasm for this role is endless I know I can build and lead a team that can work together for the benefit of our town and it would be a privilege to do so. A fresh new change in leadership.
candidates.why_stand: I have been brought up in Cobden and lived and travelled overseas. From this I have realised how lucky we are to live where we do. Since I have been on council I have found my passion is working with my community.

candidates.name: Andrew Robb
candidates.why_elect: I have lived in my community all but the first 5 years of my life. I have dedicated myself to community roles such as coaching sport and various other roles. I bring a huge amount of leadership experience to the role.
candidates.why_stand: I believe we live in an amazing district that has and still is facing a lot of pressures but also opportunities for the future.

candidates.name: Richard Osmaston
candidates.why_elect: Farm born and raised, with careers as an airline pilot and engineer, worldwide, I bring the analytical discipline and potential of major modern industry to the socioeconomic arena. A socialist, I believe we are obligated us to look beyond convention to the enormous potential that 21st century can now offer.
candidates.why_stand: We now have the potential and the opportunity to truly succeed. Science, technology and awareness provide unprecedented opportunities to live in a truly civilised, sustainable way today. Grey District has unmatched qualities to assure world leading success. Community cohesion, love, stoicism, innovation and energy are abundant. Now we need vision.
